name: auracast
description: ```yaml {   "worker": "workerObject",   "room" => {     "roomId1": {       "worker": "workerReference",       "router": "routerObject",       "peers" => { // contains all the peer data         "peerId1": {    // peerId = socket.id           "userId": "string",           "transports": ["transportId1", "transportId2"],           "producers": ["producerId1", "producerId2"],           "consumers": ["consumerId1", "consumerId2"]         },         "peerId2": {           // ...         }       },       "transports" => {         "transportId1": "transportObject"       },       "producers" => {         "producerId1": "producerObject"       },       "consumers" => {         "consumerId1": "consumerObject"       },       "peerConsumers" => {         // peerId = socket.id         "peerId1": ["producerIdA", "producerIdB"] // contains producerIds which the peer has consumed       }     },     "roomId2": {       // ...     }   } } ```
